Simulated Pseudo-Bulk Deconvolved Cell Type Compositions (osmFISH)

Source: R/data.R
osmFISH_bulk_decon.Rd

A matrix representing simulated pseudo-bulk deconvolution results, where each row corresponds to a bulk sample and each column represents a cell type proportion.

Usage

osmFISH_bulk_decon

Format

A numeric matrix of dimensions 100 x N (e.g., 100 bulk samples × 20 cell types). Row names are pseudo-bulk sample IDs, column names are cell type names.

Source

Generated by `generate_simulated_bulk_data()` using simulated osmFISH single-cell input.

On this page

Developed by Bin Duan, Hua Zou.
